result.name: Budweiser
result.tags: budweiser beer lager canada ontario labatt breweries can
result.serving_suggestion: Serve ice cold with finger foods and bar snacks.
result.tasting_note: Light golden colour; light malt & hops; light body, touch of citrus to finish

result.name: Coors Light
result.tags: coors light beer lager canada ontario molson's molsons brewery of limited can
result.tasting_note: Pale gold colour; light grain with a touch of mineral aroma and flavour; soft, pleasant finish.

result.name: Molson Canadian
result.tags: molson canadian beer lager canada ontario molson's molsons brewery of limited can
result.serving_suggestion: Great on its own. Will also complement grilled white meats, seafood and sausage. Of course, always great with bar snacks.
result.tasting_note: Made from the very best ingredients and always preservative free. Pours a light golden colour with a soft fluffy head. Delicate floral and barley aromas with notes of citrus, grain and sweet fruit. Crisp, clean, medium bodied and smooth on the palate. Flavours of light hops, sweet malt and citrus. Pleasant hoppy finish.

result.name: Stella Artois
result.tags: stella artois beer lager belgium region not specified labatt breweries ontario can
result.serving_suggestion: Pair with fish tacos, nachos or Vienna sausage.
result.tasting_note: Pale gold colour; aromas of yellow apples, toast and light floral hops; on the palate it is light-medium bodied and lightly carbonated, with flavours of fresh citrus, biscuit and light hop bitterness.

result.name: Bud Light
result.tags: bud light beer lager canada ontario labatt breweries can
result.tasting_note: Light golden colour; light malt & hops; very light body touch of citrus to finish.

result.name: Corona Extra
result.tags: corona extra beer lager mexico region not specified cerveceria modelo sa de cv bottle
result.serving_suggestion: Serve with a twist of lime; tacos or nachos
result.tasting_note: Light gold colour; forward grassy hop nose; soft hop taste; light-body; softly bitter, clean finish

result.name: Busch
result.tags: busch beer lager canada ontario labatt breweries can
result.serving_suggestion: Serve well chilled as a great refresher or serve with fajitas, wings or nachos.
result.tasting_note: Crisp and light-bodied Busch is an American classic. It pours a clear pale straw colour, with generous foamy head. Subtle malt and toasted grain aromas, and flavours of cereal, sweet malt and a hint of sweet corn. Balanced and creamy-textured on the palate, with subtle hops on the finish. Serve ice-cold with casual cuisine.

result.name: Heineken
result.tags: heineken beer lager netherlands region not specified heineken's heinekens brouwerijen nederland bv can
result.serving_suggestion: A wonderful thirst quencher. Also, a great refresher when paired with appetizers, lightly spiced dishes, pizza or burgers.
result.tasting_note: 142 years of tradition are behind this iconic, premium lager. Clear gold yellow colour with fine head. Appealing aromas of sweet malt, floral hops and hints of biscuit, grain and herb. Dry, crisp and fresh with a creamy texture. Flavours of barley malt and fruit, leading to grassy/herbal notes on a refreshing bitter finish.

result.name: Laker Ice
result.tags: laker ice beer lager canada ontario the brick brewing co can
result.serving_suggestion: Serve with grilled meats, pizza, chicken wings or mildly spicy dishes.
result.tasting_note: Laker Ice is ice-brewed, resulting in a clean, smooth finish and slightly higher alcohol level. Malty notes in the foreground with moderate hops bitterness providing balance.

result.name: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Cabernet Sauvignon
result.tags: wolf blass yellow label cabernet sauvignon wine red australia region not specified mildara limited bottle
result.description: This Cabernet Sauvignon is full-bodied and dry with blackcurrant, eucalyptus, spice and oak flavours. It's a superb gift for fans of bold Aussie reds.

result.name: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc
result.tags: kim crawford sauvignon blanc wine white new zealand marlborough constellation brands inc bottle
result.description: This sets the benchmark for New Zealand's intensely flavourful style of Sauvignon Blanc: think gooseberry, pea pods and passion fruit. Vivid and refreshing, it pairs well with steamed clams or mussels with asparagus risotto, or grilled chicken.
result.tasting_note: This sets the benchmark for New Zealand's intensely flavourful style of Sauvignon Blanc: think gooseberry, pea pods and passion fruit. Vivid and refreshing, it pairs well with steamed clams or mussels with asparagus risotto, or grilled chicken.

result.name: Old Milwaukee Ice
result.tags: old milwaukee ice beer lager canada ontario sleeman brewing malting co can
result.serving_suggestion: Serve with party mix and easy going snacks.
result.tasting_note: Yellow amber; light grainy aroma; dry, slightly bitter flavour.

result.name: Baileys Original Irish Cream
result.tags: baileys original irish cream spirits liqueurliquor ireland region not specified r a bailey co ltd bottle
result.tasting_note: Baileys is a natural marriage of fresh Irish dairy cream and Irish Whiskey and is a household name when it comes to cream liqueurs. Fragrant and flavourful with fresh coffee, hazelnut and chocolate notes; sweet, creamy and thick yet well balanced by a smooth whiskey note for a smooth, lingering finish.

result.name: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
result.tags: peller family vineyards pinot grigio wine white canada region not specified andrew limited bagnbox
result.tasting_note: A dry, light-bodied white wine with refreshing pear and citrus flavours

result.name: Crown Royal Whisky
result.tags: crown royal whisky spirits whiskywhiskey canada region not specified the distilling co bottle
result.serving_suggestion: Enjoy over ice, neat or with your favourite mixer.
result.tasting_note: Aging in both new and seasoned white oak barrels give Crown Royal its unique flavour profile that has garnered fans the world over. Light amber in colour the nose is lightly floral with corn, buttery/vanilla and peach aromas; on the palate look for light sweet peach flavour with wood spice on a dry finish.

result.name: Labatt Blue
result.tags: labatt blue beer lager canada ontario breweries can
result.serving_suggestion: Pair with light snacks and finger foods, such as pretzels, bar nuts, chips and party mix.
result.tasting_note: Labatt Blue is the world's best-selling Canadian beer, named for the colour of its label by fans of the Winnipeg Blue Bombers football team. It's fresh and crisp, with cereal grain, citrus and grassy hops notes; perfect for backyard entertaining.
